summary: Tonia goes out drinking. She wakes up in prison, not having a clue why she's there. She is tortured to encourage her to confess to a crime she is not aware of.
cast: Krystyna Janda|Adam Ferency|Janusz Gajos|Agnieszka Holland|Anna Romantowska|Bozena Dykiel|Olgierd Lukaszewicz|Tomasz Dedek|Jan Jurewicz|Jaroslaw Kopaczewski|Zofia Balucka|Arkadiusz Bazak|Krzysztof Gosztyla|Antonina Girycz|O. Jasinska|Tomasz Lengren|Katarzyna Laniewska|Kazimierz Meres|Wieslawa Mazurkiewicz|Marlena Miarczynska|Anna Mozolanka|Jerzy Zass|Jacek Borkowski|Jacek Kalucki|Danuta Kowalska|Daria Trafankowska|Hanna Mikuc
title: El interrogatorio
